item.description: THe settings for adapter 2 of client 1 is not clickable. Is it because I’m not connected to ethernet?

item.title: 02-network and hardware protocols
item.description: OSI model physical, data link, network, transport, session, presentation, application encapsulation Five layers in Internet: physical, data link, network, transport, application (including presentation and session layers of OSI model), TCP/IP sits in kernel of operating system.

item.title: 05-filesystems
item.description: access control models DAC - subject centered MAC - object centered RBAC ACL list of who can do what things to which files backups
